tasks.task: Diving into a fertilizer bag
subtasks: Remove the fertilizer bag from the storage area
Position oneself above the open bag
Bend down and place hands into the bag
Mix the fertilizer using hand movements
Lift the bag back upright to prevent spillage

tasks.task: Re-rolling a roll of twine
subtasks: Place the remaining twine onto the ground or a flat surface
Kneel down and grasp the twine near one end
Coil the twine steadily, starting from the center
Maintain the roll's tightness as coiling progresses
Ensure the twine doesn't unravel during the process

tasks.task: Approaching a combine harvester to attach a tool
subtasks: Walk towards the combine harvester carefully
Ensure the combine is turned off and properly parked
Reach over a safety guard if needed to check attachment points
Attach the tool to the combine's hitch mechanism
Align the tool with the hitch points
Tighten any necessary bolts or straps for secure attachment

tasks.task: Climbing onto a combine harvester
subtasks: Haul oneself up onto the platform of the combine
Secure hold onto the ladder or handrails for stability
Sit into the operator's seat once on board

tasks.task: Shutting down a combine harvester
subtasks: Turn off the engine, ensuring all functions have stopped
Engage the parking brake to immobilize the vehicle
Turn off any auxiliary power sources if applicable

tasks.task: Operator mounting and dismounting a piece of equipment
subtasks: Approach the equipment carefully, especially if it's moving
Use handholds, steps, or ladders to mount the equipment
Hold onto the equipment securely as moving parts might start
Wait until the equipment has completely stopped before dismounting
Dismount in a controlled manner, descending slowly and safely

tasks.task: Cleaning a wheel tire
subtasks: Locate the tire to be cleaned on the equipment
Determine if water or a cleaning solution is required
Use hands to scrub the tire clean using appropriate agents
Thoroughly wash the tire to remove soil, mud, or debris
Rinse the tire with water to remove all cleaning agents

tasks.task: Planting with a subsoiler attachment
subtasks: Align the subsoiler attachment with the ground first
Ensure the depth of penetration is set according to the operator's requirements
Operate the subsoiler to break up compacted soil
Monitor the equipment's operation for proper performance

tasks.task: Installing a water filter on a combine harvester
subtasks: Retrieve a new water filter from storage
Wear gloves if necessary to handle the filter
Locate the water filtration system's access point on the combine
Disconnect the old filter from the system
Insert the new filter into the system and attach it securely
Check for leaks around the filter's connections

tasks.task: Inspecting a Nilfisk combine for proper operation
subtasks: Start the combine engine and let it warm up
Check the engine’s oil level and tighten any necessary connections
Test the braking system to ensure proper function
Inspect all belts and chains for wear or damage
Check the condition of crops in the combine's auger
Test the hydraulic system to ensure smooth operation of arms and implements

tasks.task: Checking the balance on a testing machine
subtasks: Attach the farming equipment to the testing machine
Input the relevant parameters (such as load, speed) into the machine
Begin the test run and monitor the balance indicator
Make adjustments to balance weights if necessary
Verify the balance through further runs to confirm accuracy

tasks.task: Returning a mechanical assist device to the operator
subtasks: Ensure the device is properly disengaged from the machinery
Assist the operator in retracting the device to a safe position
Check that all safety guards are re-secured after use
Communicate with the operator for proper technique, such as steering and throttle adjustment

tasks.task: Cleaning a worn down attachment
subtasks: Disassemble the worn attachment to access all parts
Identify which cleaning solution or tool is appropriate for the material
Use appropriate cleaning tools-motion and chemicals-to remove dirt and buildup
Scrub each component thoroughly to prevent wear from residue
Rinse all parts with clean water afterward

tasks.task: Attaching a trailer to a tractor
subtasks: Walk alongside the tractor and trailer to position
Attach the tractor’s drawbar to the trailer’s hitch pin
Lock the trailer brakes to prevent movement during attachment
Hook up any electrical connections, such as lights and brakes
Check that the trailer is properly secured with safety chains

tasks.task: Checking crop in an auger
subtasks: Open the auger entry port on the combine or storage unit
Reach inside with a stick or rod to check for crop buildup
Clear any clogged material to prevent damage
Inspect the auger's teeth for wear or obstruction

tasks.task: Adjusting the depth setting on a chisel plow
subtasks: Stop the equipment and switch off the engine if necessary
Locate the depth adjustment mechanism on the plow
Use a tool or hand to adjust the depth according to the operator’s desired setting
Lock the adjustment in place once set to prevent accidental changes

tasks.task: Checking transmission oil on a combine harvester
subtasks: Locate the oil fill and drain plug on the transmission
Lift the oil access cover or use a scissor lift if needed
Check the oil level and quality, noting if it’s dirty or low
Add oil if necessary, ensuring the correct type and quantity

tasks.task: Climbing up a combine harvester’s auger
subtasks: Face the auger at the front of the combine to ascend
Use the ladder attached to the auger for steady ascent
Hold onto the ladder steps or handrails as moving parts below
Secure footing as the operator may adjust speed or direction

tasks.task: Refueling a tractor with diesel and starting it
subtasks: Move the fuel container to the tractor fuel tank
Position the tractor so the fuel filler is accessible
Open the fuel tank cap, if required
Connect the fuel hose from the container to the tractor’s filler port
Insert the fuel nozzle into the tank and start pumping when the fuel stops siphoning
Once the fuel gauge indicates full, wait for the pump to turn off
Remove the fuel hose and nozzle, ensure connections are tight
Prime the fuel system, perhaps by cycling the key a few times
Start the tractor engine once fuel is confirmed present

tasks.task: Performing cosmetic trailer painting
subtasks: Wash and dry the trailer surface thoroughly before painting
Create a level surface, possibly using a tarp or block to steady
Set up a ladder or step stool to reach high areas
Apply primer to the trailer’s body using a paint roller or brush
Sand the primer coat lightly once dry to smooth any bumps
Apply top coat paint using a spray can or brush for even coverage

tasks.task: Checking the frame of a combine harvester
subtasks: Inspect the main structural parts for cracks or deformations
Look for signs of rust or corrosion, especially on exposed areas
Tighten any loose bolts or connections found during inspection
Check the condition of the hitch and drawbar for wear or damage
Evaluate the condition of the tires for proper inflation and damage

tasks.task: Replacing a tire on a combine harvester
subtasks: Remove the combine tires from the machine, using knock-off tools if necessary
Inspect the new tire for proper size and fit
Install the new tire onto the rim, ensuring it's seated correctly
Use a tire gauge to check the inflation pressure
Remount the tire onto the combine, ensuring it's secure and tight
